course_title: World Music Ensembles - CHIN INSTRMTL EN

sections.comments: CHINESE INSTRUMENTAL ENSEMBLE.  For graduate students (undergraduates register in MUSC 165A 001).  Music Majors:  for resolution of Tuesday scheduling conflicts, please speak with the instructor. NOTE: This section will *NOT* be able to accept new students after September 12, 2020.Students do not need to know a Chinese instrument to join this ensemble, however, students need to sign up for an interview before class begins; these will be used to admit students according to cognate instrument abilities.http://www.music.ubc.ca/index.php?id=2011

description: Training on traditional instruments and their techniques, with emphasis on ensemble performance. Different sections focus on the music of different cultures, e.g., Bali, China, Ghana, Korea.
